Name: Full Animal Party
About the game: Full Animal Party is a 1 to 4 player online and local party game currently in early access. You will have to compete against other party animals in 35 different trials and four board modes in order to be crowned victor. Multiplayer modes The game supports local and online matches (online players can join your multi-local room) and bots are able to fill the empty spots once their behaviour has been configured in the remaining trials. Deceive your friends in skill trials or push them out of the platforming ones in a galore of hilarity. New boards update Hexagon Island has arrived! Acquire and upgrade properties or commerces and make your opponents spend all their money on them. Lunar Station is here too! With a more classic arcade gameplay, players will have to roam around the board and get the highest number of batteries possible for their space ships in order to win. It features six different types of items to mess with the rest of your adventure companions! More party animals to choose from Since version 0.35 the array of available characters has increased to 18, choose your favourite and feel free to request any color tone for them. What will arrive in upcoming updates: Upgrades to AI bots skills. More trials (and improvements to the current ones!) More boards for main mode. Extra characters. Optimizations to split-screen modes and the game overall. Join the community for updates and vote on which features you want to arrive sooner, which trials should be improved and which ones should be removed.
